title: View Patient Cost and Utilization
description: A care manager is reviewing a high-risk patient and wants to see their healthcare cost and utilization over the past year.

tasks.description: Open the patient's record in the population health platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: The care manager finds the correct patient.

tasks.description: Navigate to the cost and utilization dashboard for the patient.
tasks.expected_outcome: The care manager opens the patient's financial and utilization summary.

tasks.description: Review the data, which shows the patient has had three ED visits and one inpatient admission in the last 12 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: The care manager uses the data to understand the patient's history and identify opportunities to reduce unnecessary utilization.
